title: Project 1
description: The first thing you do when you get here...: create a game! In this 'Entry Project', you form a team with other students and just start. We will provide you with resources, teach some basics and help you manage your project.

title: Visual 1
description: Learn to visualize your ideas with pen and paper or even modelling clay. This hands on course teaches the very basics of concept art and visualization.

title: Theory 1
description: Learn the basics of human computer interaction, how computers actually work and how humans percieve their surroundings. This knowledge is crucial to create compelling experiences in the future.
